text:
As a company at Salesforce,
we're asking ourselves,

how do we help all our
customers become Agent first?

We recently launched
Agentforce.

With Agentforce
and Slack native AI

our customers
are able to choose

and bring together these
solutions, which brings the,

the power of intelligent
AI and agents together

and maximizes the the
productivity and the benefits.

We partnered
with AWS

to power the native
Slack AI capabilities,

leveraging
Amazon SageMaker

and Amazon Bedrock to bring
secure, trusted environment

that allows us to leverage
multiple world-class LLMs

to bring the native
capabilities into Slack.

Businesses are
all-in on AI and agents.

Building on AWS empowers Slack
to move fast, to have the,

the comfort of security
and the trust that is so important to us

and to
our customers,

and to have access to
world-class LLMs

and use the
best model

for the the right
use case.
